title: Validity of special purpose revenue bonds
context: [ยง39A-232] Validity of special purpose revenue bonds. The special purpose revenue bonds bearing the signature or facsimile signature of officers on the date of the signing thereof shall be valid and sufficient for all purposes, notwithstanding that before the delivery thereof and payment therefor all the persons whose signatures appear thereon shall have ceased to be officers of the department. The special purpose revenue bonds shall contain a recital that they are issued pursuant to this part, which recital shall be conclusive evidence of their validity and of the regularity of their issuance. [L 1994, c 280, pt of ยง6]
